name: ink spots (incomplete)
description:
a broken game about broken things

join max and emily on this surreal journey by the creators of other things. waking up in a mysterious cell with no recollection of how they got there, our dynamic duo begin their escape from this odd place called the other region. along the way, they meet a philosophizing robot that plays golf, living ice-cream, and the physical manifestations of love and hate themselves. along the way, they grow connected and learn more about themselves and each other blah blah blah. but will this be enough to escape from the grasp of the bizarre and evil forces within the other region?

complete with an atmospheric soundtrack, witty dialogue, surreal imagery, a uniquely expressionistic art style inspired by my inability to draw, and a rather terrible 720p resolution, ink spots (incomplete) is sure to be an experience that’ll make you say, “that was a half of an experience; where's the other half of the vn, bitch” (currently sitting on a partially borked hard drive, meaning i'll have to redo a shit-ton from the ground-up, so sorry)

CONTENT/TRIGGER WARNING: contains frequent swearing; fairly bloody and frequent violence which is mostly dampened by the cartoony art-style; several deaths from various causes; occasional yet minor and non-explicit sexual themes; and last but not least, a lengthy sequence involving domestic abuse

written and programmed by inunonaizo

music by inu with extra sounds by the diaper daddies

art direction precariously by inu + pexels.com for the single stock image in this that i probably won’t actually use in the final product

thanks to all the folks at freesound.org who put a creative commons license on their sound files

actual thanks to gra noo and cupcake

sorry if there are bugs or typos; uploading this was a spur of the moment decision, and i am really tired right now

2nd half coming eventually? depends on how many people actually download this
